alert.note: Alert for Mojave Desert Slopes; South End San Joaquin Valley; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 12:43PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Kern County through 115 PM PDT... At 1242 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Stallion Springs, or 32 miles southeast of Bakersfield, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Also expect brief heavy rain and dangerous lightning. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Kern County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Mojave Desert Slopes; South End San Joaquin Valley; Tehachapi
